Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: William Herebert, Hymn to the Virgin Mary — fifty-seven lines in six-line stanzas (aabccb)

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Þou wommon boute nereþyn oune nader bereGret wonder þys was…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Sathan shal nout spedeWyþ wrenches ne wyþ crok
BLAdd46919.Note: Third and sixth lines of each stanza written to right of others, as if tail; ends “Amen” after line 42, then 15 further lines added at bottom of leaf, with line marking insertion before “Amen.”
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (written in margin to left of first line)
